clearcontrol.core.concurrent.executors

Interface AsynchronousSchedulerFeature

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AsynchronousProcessor, AsynchronousProcessorBase, AsynchronousProcessorNull, AsynchronousProcessorPool, AsynchronousProcessorToString, BoundedVariablePaneDemo, LaserDeviceSimulator, MicroscopeBase, ObjectVariableAsynchronousProcessorPool, Stack2DDisplay, StackCameraDeviceSimulator, StageDeviceSimulator, TSTStageDevice, UnivariateAffineFunctionPaneDemo, VisualConsoleDemo

    public interface AsynchronousSchedulerFeature
    Asynchronous scheduler feature. Provides methods for starting scheduled tasks
    Author:
    royer

    • Method Summary

      Schedules a runnable to execute at fixed rate, with a given inicial delay, period, and time unit.

      Schedules a runnable to execute at fixed rate with a given period
      default WaitingScheduledFuture<?> scheduleNTimesAtFixedRate(java.lang.Runnable pRunnable, long pTimes, long pInitialDelay, long pPeriod, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit pTimeUnit)
      Schedules the execution of a runnable for a fixed number of times, after an initial delay and with a given period.

      Schedules the execution of a given runnable for a fixed number of times and period
